protocol.text: The Microarray Suite version 5.0 (MAS 5.0) algorithm implemented in Affymetrix Expression Console software (version1.2) was used to normalize the raw data. To reduce noise for the significance analysis, probe sets that were called "Present" by the MAS5 detection call in 100% of the samples were selected.  Highly expressed genes that showed over 2-fold difference between the signal values of control and test samples were selected for further study. ID_REF =  VALUE = MAS5.0 signal intensity ABS_CALL = indicating whether the transcript was present (P), absent (A), or marginal (M) DETECTION P-VALUE =
The Col-0 and atsf1-2 mutant seeds were plated on MS agar plates. Seedlings were grown at 23 C with 16-h light and 8-h dark cycles for 9 days before being harvested.
Biotinylated cDNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 300 ng total RNA (GeneChip 3 IVT Express Kit User Manual P/N 702646 Rev. 1, Affymetrix).

Following fragmentation, fragmented cDNA were hybridized for 16 hr at 45C on Affymetrix GeneChip Arabidopsis Genome Array. The GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450.
GeneChips were scanned using the Affymetrix GeneChip Scanner 3000 7G
